overview:
Dave Schneider is the Executive Vice President of Global Sales for EMC’s Backup Recovery Systems division, which is focused on the development and delivery of next-generation disk-based backup, recovery and archive solutions.

Previously he served as Senior Vice President of Sales for Data Domain Inc where he was responsible for driving company revenues from zero to nearly $1.5 billions in seven years.

Prior to joining Data Domain, Mr. Schneider was Vice President of Alliances, Channel and OEM sales for Borland Software Corporation. He also served as Vice President of Western United States Sales for TogetherSoft Corporation (later acquired by Borland Software Corporation).

Mr. Schneider holds a B.A in Political Science from the University of California, Irvine.
